short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get TLDRs summaries of Reddit posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get TLDR summaries of Reddit posts.

This extensions add a "TLDR"-button to Reddit posts that quickly gives a TLDR summary of the content in the post. 

Quick TLDRs for Reddit helps you while staying up to date without having to read for hours.
